text: George Godfrey (26 July 1888 - 22 May 1965) was a South African swimmer. He competed in the men's 400 metre freestyle event at the 1912 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1888 births Category:1965 deaths Category:South African male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of South Africa Category:Swimmers at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Durban Category:Colony of Natal people
title: George Godfrey (swimmer)
